article_title: Shorthanded St. John’s Faces San Diego State in NCAA Tournament
article_text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C.—When six St. John’s basketball players stepped onto a podium early Thursday night here in Charlotte, Rysheed Jordan just happened to be placed at center stage. Then he was asked the most questions—by far.

On the eve of the Red Storm’s first NCAA tournament game since 2011, Jordan, the sophomore guard from Philadelphia who has been suspended, taken a leave of absence, and endured the deaths of relatives and a friend...

twitter.description: Reeling from the suspension of forward Chris Obekpa, the St. John’ s Red Storm will look to senior Sir’Dominic Pointer to play the game of his life as the program looks for its first NCAA tournament win since 2000.
twitter.title: Shorthanded St. John’s Faces San Diego State in NCAA Tournament

CHARLOTTE, N.C.—When six St. John’s basketball players stepped onto a podium early Thursday night here in Charlotte, Rysheed Jordan just happened to be placed at center stage.
On the eve of the Red Storm’s first NCAA tournament game since 2011, Jordan, the sophomore guard from Philadelphia who has been suspended, taken a leave of absence, and endured the deaths of relatives and a friend...
Then he was asked the most questions—by far.
